content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Thank you for your interest in my apartment, Emilia. Currently, I have an ambitious perspective on the rental price. Let's begin the negotiation with a proposed price of 1300 Euros per month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: While your apartment sounds very attractive in a prime location, I must express my concern about the proposed price of 1300 Euros. Considering my situation as a student, I seek an opportunity to negotiate for a more affordable rate. I don't want to continue the negotiation at this moment due to the significant gap in our price expectations.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I understand your situation, Emilia, but my goal remains firm: I want to achieve the highest price possible. Unfortunately, I cannot reduce the rental price at this time. I don't want to continue the negotiation because maintaining my high rental expectation aligns with my objectives. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
